Docs.summary: An enumeration indicating how the cached bitmap of a view must be rendered when the view's bounds change.
Docs.remarks: The contents of the are cached in a bitmap, the values in this enumeration determine what happens to a view when the bounds of that view change. With these you can control whether the bitmap is stretched or whether the view is redrawn.
